transcript_segments.text: NAMASKARAM. Today's recipe is one of the favourite dishes of non-veg eaters — Chicken Biryani. I'm preparing Chicken Biryani using Basmati rice. Guys, my name is Shan Gio and welcome to the video.

Chicken Biryani is made using half of 1 chicken, around 600 grams. This serves 3 people. From 20 pieces of a full chicken, 10 are used. In hotels, 1 chicken is usually cut into 12 pieces. At home, chicken takes longer to cook. Add 1 tsp of ginger-garlic paste.
